ğŸ”„ AUTO-START KHI KHá»I Äá»˜NG WINDOWS

CÃCH 1: Startup Folder (Dá»… nháº¥t)
--------------------------------
1. Nháº¥n Win + R
2. GÃµ: shell:startup
3. Nháº¥n Enter
4. Copy shortcut vÃ o thÆ° má»¥c nÃ y

â†’ Pháº§n má»m tá»± Ä‘á»™ng cháº¡y khi báº­t mÃ¡y!

CÃCH 2: Task Scheduler (NÃ¢ng cao)
----------------------------------
1. Má»Ÿ Task Scheduler (gÃµ trong Start Menu)
2. Create Basic Task
3. Name: "AZ POOLARENA ATTENDANCE Auto Start"
4. Trigger: "When I log on"
5. Action: "Start a program"
6. Program: ÄÆ°á»ng dáº«n Ä‘áº¿n .exe
7. Finish

âš™ï¸ TIPS & TRICKS

TIP 1: PhÃ­m táº¯t (Shortcut Key)
-------------------------------
1. Click pháº£i shortcut â†’ Properties
2. Tab "Shortcut"
3. Shortcut key: Nháº¥n Ctrl + Alt + A (hoáº·c phÃ­m báº¥t ká»³)
4. OK

â†’ Nháº¥n Ctrl + Alt + A Ä‘á»ƒ má»Ÿ pháº§n má»m tá»« báº¥t ká»³ Ä‘Ã¢u!

TIP 2: Run as Administrator
----------------------------
1. Click pháº£i shortcut â†’ Properties
2. Tab "Shortcut" â†’ Advanced
3. âœ“ "Run as administrator"
4. OK

â†’ Cháº¡y vá»›i quyá»n admin (cáº§n cho má»™t sá»‘ mÃ¡y)

TIP 3: Start Minimized
----------------------
1. Click pháº£i shortcut â†’ Properties
2. Tab "Shortcut"
3. Run: "Minimized"
4. OK

â†’ Cháº¡y á»Ÿ cháº¿ Ä‘á»™ thu nhá» (background)
